subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Adrian Gonzalez smacked a two-run double off the left-field wall with one out in the ninth inning to give the Boston Red Sox an 8-7 win over the visiting Baltimore Orioles on Monday night.
snippet: Adrian Gonzalez smacked a two-run double off the left-field wall with one out in the ninth inning to give the Boston Red Sox an 8-7 win over the visiting Baltimore Orioles on Monday night.
